description:
One of the things about shooting with amateurs is you never know how things will go. There's no script or acting. You just put them together and see what happens.
That's kind of how it was with Rocky and Boyce. As we've learned, Boyce is kind of a serious guy, but he loves having his ass played with and fucked. Rocky is a comedian and I'm always amazed at the things he says. So, if I had to pick one word to describe their initial interaction it would be "awkward."
Things took a complete 180-degree turn when Boyce's pants came off and his ass went up into the air. Rocky went straight for it...
Rocky has a very unique style of fucking. He kind of alternates between sensual and jackhammer!
title: Rocky & Boyce
